message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand you're looking for a good deal.  How about we meet in the middle at $175?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $155?
